page.title: 04HOME LIFE (3)
page.content:
{As many homes still have open fires {the Coalman delivers fortnightly and {a fuel tanker for those houses with {oil fired central heating.
For entertainment most families enjoy watching television,listening to the radio also records & tapes.Some homes have computers and video machines.
Once a week the mobile library van calls in the village,stopping outside the Horse & Groom Public House.
Every Saturday a mobile Fish & Chip van stops in the village to enable people to buy a ready cooked meal, a popular way for lots of families in l985.
